A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first half is extremely boring. I felt myself nodding off when half the characters were stuck on a ship while the other half were stuck on an island for 45 mins. It all seemed pointless. Last Jedi is a filler episode. They try to make up for it with an action packed finale that ultimately feels like a desperate attempt to get you to come back for the next one. Not worth seeing in theaters. Not even really worth renting. Wait for it to stream on netflix.
